General.Name: Zhejiang Langdi Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Langdi Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells wheels for household air conditioners in China. It also forward direct driven, backward belt driven, axial-flow, single inlet forward and backward, FCU, and other fans; cross flow, axial-flow, backward, centrifugal, and FCU wheels; fan motors; air conditioning filters; and impeller spare parts, as well as polymer composites. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Yuyao, China.
